Single_Shot.help: You fire a single blast from your Beam Rifle which deals Moderate Energy damage and has a chance to knock the target down. If the target is suffering from Disintegrate, Single Shot will reduce the target's regeneration rate slightly. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Single_Shot.shortHelp: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown, Special

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} effect reduces {PlayerDest} regeneration rate slightly due to Disintegration.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource}'s Disintegration effect reduces your regeneration rate with their {PowerName}!

Charged_Shot.help: By charging up your Beam Rifle, you're able to launch a concentrated blast of energy at your foe to cause High Energy damage. The impact strikes with such force that it can knock your target off of their feet. Charge Shot causes additional damage if the target is suffering from Disintegration. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Charged_Shot.shortHelp: Ranged, High DMG(Energy), Foe Knockdown, Special

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage [DISINTEGRATE].
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage [DISINTEGRATE].

Cutting_Beam.help: You fire a constant stream of energy from your weapon and sweep it in a broad arc blasting all foes in a wide cone in front of you. Cutting beam deals Moderate Energy damage and reduces the targets' Defense. This power will cause Minor Energy damage over time if the target is suffering from Disintegration. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long
Cutting_Beam.targetHelp: Your defense has been reduced by the Cutting Beam!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time [DISINTEGRATE].
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time [DISINTEGRATE].

Disintegrate.help: You fire a stream of energy at your foe which causes them to slowly disintegrate and suffer High Energy damage over 10 seconds. Using Beam Rifle powers on targets affected by Disintegrate will inflict additional effects. Damage: High, Recharge: Long

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} effect reduces {PlayerDest} regeneration rate.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} effect reduces your regeneration rate with their {PowerName}!

Aim.help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long
Aim.attackerHit: You activate {PowerName} and increase the power of your next few attacks.

messages.attackerHit: You quickly take aim and are more accurate and more deadly for a short while.

Lancer_Shot.help: You charge up your Beam Rifle and deliver an incredibly focused ray of energy that deals Superior Energy damage and will briefly stun the target. Lancer Shot will cause additional damage if the target is suffering from Disintegrate. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Lancer_Shot.shortHelp: Ranged, Superior DMG(Energy), Foe Stun, Special
Lancer_Shot.targetHelp: You have disoriented by the Lancer Shot's impact.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage [DISINTEGRATE].
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage [DISINTEGRATE].

Piercing_Beam.help: You release a supercharged beam in a narrow cone of energy that pierces through up to 3 enemies. Piercing Beam deals High Energy damage and briefly reduces their damage resistance. If a target struck by Piercing Beam is also affected by Disintegrate it will immediately suffer additional damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Long
Piercing_Beam.shortHelp: Narrow Ranged (Cone), High DMG(Energy), Foes -Res, Special
Piercing_Beam.targetHelp: Your damage resistance has been reduced by the Piercing Beam.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage [DISINTEGRATE].
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage [DISINTEGRATE].

Overcharge.help: You overcharge your Beam Rifle and release a massive blast of energy at a group of distant foes causing Extreme Energy damage, causing Minor Energy damage over time, reducing the defense of all affected foes and potentially stunning affected foes. If Overcharge strikes a target suffering from Disintegrate they will be affected by a much stronger stun. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Overcharge.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Extreme DMG(Energy), Foe Minor DoT (Energy), -Def(All), Disorient, Special
Overcharge.targetHelp: You have been disoriented and are suffering energy damage over time from the Overcharge.
